verses.verse: PSALM 52Futility of Boastful Wickedness.For the music director. A Maskil of David, when Doeg the Edomite came and told Saul and said to him, “David has come to the house of Ahimelech.” (Possibly Contemplative; or Didactic; or Skillful Psalm) (1 Sam 22:9) Why do you boast in evil, you mighty man? The faithfulness of God endures all day long.
Your tongue devises destruction, Like a sharp razor, you worker of deceit.
You love evil more than good, Lies more than speaking what is right. Selah
You love all words that devour, You deceitful tongue.
(Or Also) But God will break you down forever; He will snatch you up and tear you away from your tent, And uproot you from the land of the living. Selah
The righteous will see and fear, And they will laugh at him, saying,
“Behold, the man who would not make God his refuge, But trusted in the abundance of his riches And was strong in (Or his destruction) his evil desire.”
But as for me, I am like a green olive tree in the house of God; I trust in the faithfulness of God forever and ever.
I will praise You forever, because You have done it, And I will wait on Your name, for it is good, in the presence of Your godly ones.
